Text: September th Fund ConfirmationPST Dear Phil Platter Thank you for your gift of to The September th Fund The Fund was established by United Way of New York City and The New York Community Trust to respond to the immediate and longerterm needs of victims their families and communities affected by the tragic events of September Within days of the attacks checks were being written to victims and their families by experienced relief agencies using cash grants from The September th Fund Right now your contribution is helping to provide emergency cash assistance legal counseling grief therapy job training and placement and other vital services for victims families and others directly affected Your gift is helping people and communities rebuild their lives On behalf of Joshua Gotbaum chief executive officer of The September th Fund we invite you to visit for uptodate information and to sign up for email updates on how your contribution to The September th Fund is helping to fund recovery efforts If your employer has a matching gift program for The September th Fund and requires verification of your gift this email will serve as that verification Please contact your companys human resource or community affairs department if you have any questions Again thank you for your continued support of The September th Fund and of community foundations and United Ways across the country Sincerely Ralph Dickerson Jr President United Way of New York City

September th Telethon Fund ConfirmationDear Joseph Stepenovitch Thank you for your gift of to The September th Telethon Fund The Fund was established to collect and distribute contributions to the Tribute to Heroes telethon organized by the entertainment industry in response to the tragic events of September The September th Fund has been providing emergency grants to expert relief agencies directly serving immediate needs of victims and their families Right now your contribution to the Telethon fund is helping to provide emergency cash assistance to victims and their families Your gift will also help to support the full range of support that victims and family members need to rebuild their lives On behalf of Joshua Gotbaum executive director and chief executive officer of The September th Fund we invite you to visit for uptodate information and to sign up for email updates on how your gift is helping victims and their families If your employer has a matching gift program for The September th Fund and requires verification of your gift this letter will serve as that verification Please contact your companys human resource or community affairs department if you have any questions Again thank you for allowing us the opportunity to serve those in need during this time of crisis Sincerely Ralph Dickerson Jr President United Way of New York City PS We will mail you a paper receipt for your tax records shortly
